section.name: Overview
section.p: Commons Logging uses Ant as a build system and Maven 1.x for documentation only.

section.name: Maven Goals
section.p: To build the full website, run "maven site". The result will be in "target/docs". You must be online and using JDK 1.4 or higher to successfully complete this target.
Further details can be found in the commons build instructions.

section.name: Ant Goals
section.p: The complete release distribution is created by the dist target. Note that both a 1.2 JRE and a 1.4 JRE are needed to create the release distribution as well as all optional dependencies. See build.properties.sample for more details.
